last_episode_to_air.name: Death List Three
last_episode_to_air.overview: Pac finally gets answers from Danny, but they’re not exactly the answers he was hoping for…

name: Deadbeat
overview: Kevin Pacalioglu may have no money and no clue, but he can see dead people, so that’s pretty cool. Faced with a constant stream of stubborn spirits, Pac goes to whatever lengths require the least amount of effort to help New York City’s most frivolous ghosts finish their unfinished business, occasionally with the help of his best friend and drug dealer, Roofie.

episodes.name: The Sexorcism
episodes.overview: Kevin struggles to help a ghost whose unfinished business involves losing his virginity to an ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Hot God Contest
episodes.overview: When the ghost of a competitive eater starts unplugging feeding tubes at a hospital, Kevin must convince the recipient of the ghost’s stomach to enter one last hot-dog eating contest.

episodes.name: The Knockoff
episodes.overview: While helping the ghost of a DVD bootlegger recover the last movie he ever shot, Kevin encounters mafia members looking for the same tape, which just might contain footage of a mob hit.

episodes.name: The Comedium
episodes.overview: When a deceased stand-up comedian continues to take the stage each night after closing, Kevin looks for the worst audience possible to heckle him into the Light.

episodes.name: Out of Body Issues
episodes.overview: After Roofie falls for a saleswoman at a clothing store, Kevin must help the ghost of a former employee track down exploitative photos of her taken by the company’s sleazy CEO.

episodes.name: Raising the Dead
episodes.overview: In an attempt to reconnect with his boyhood crush, Kevin tries to barter for a special gift by exorcising a haunted orphanage… on Halloween.

episodes.name: The Calamityville Horror
episodes.overview: Roofie brings Kevin along to fix up a teardown he bought online, but when the house locks the two friends inside, Kevin must uncover the reason behind the haunting.

episodes.name: The Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: When investigating a haunted apartment, Kevin discovers the ghost of inventor Rube Goldberg, who needs help pulling off the most elaborate “Rube Goldberg machine” of all time.

episodes.name: Sixty Feet Under
episodes.overview: When the Mayor of New York City offers him a career-making case, Kevin encounters the toughest ghost problem he’s ever faced.

episodes.name: Pieces of Sue
episodes.overview: Kevin races to help the ghost of a friend finish her unfinished business before time runs out.

episodes.name: The Ex-orcism
episodes.overview: Sue finds herself unable to move on into the light in her new ghost form, though Pac is here to help.

episodes.name: Table for Sue
episodes.overview: Pac agrees to help out a new upscale restaurant haunted by the ghost of a previous chef, who can’t pass on until a smug Yelp reviewer retracts his dissatisfied critique. Chamomile tricks Pac into working for her.

episodes.name: Ghosts Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Pac must convince a cranky teenage ghost to haunt elsewhere.

episodes.name: Last Dance with Edith Jane
episodes.overview: Pac helps a 1940’s Broadway dancer train for a nursing home talent show.

episodes.name: The Occult Leader
episodes.overview: Pac becomes the reluctant cult leader of a group en route to Pluto.

episodes.name: Good Will Haunting
episodes.overview: Pac takes a job at a school in order to help the ghost of a janitor.

episodes.name: The Blowfish Job
episodes.overview: Pac's adoptive father TJ shows up in need of Pac's help exorcising his new apartment.

episodes.name: The Spank Job
episodes.overview: Pac helps a ghost rescue his girlfriend from their Y2K bunker, now trapped beneath a sperm bank.

episodes.name: The Emancipation Apparition
episodes.overview: Pac and Sue’s romantic staycation at the Waldorf Astoria is interrupted by the ghost of a US President.

episodes.name: The Unholy Trinity
episodes.overview: Frustrated that they can’t consummate their relationship physically, Pac and Sue hire a sex vessel for Sue to possess.

episodes.name: The Polaroid Flasher
episodes.overview: Roofie, arrested for drug dealing, needs Pac’s help from prison to obtain a specific bag of weed.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Christmas Presents
episodes.overview: Pac is visited by the ghost of Santa Claus who needs his help delivering one final present.

episodes.name: Finger Fucked
episodes.overview: Federal immigration agents crash Pac’s surprise party to celebrate Roofie’s release from prison.

episodes.name: El Caboose
episodes.overview: In order to afford to leave the seedy massage parlor where he’s been hiding out for the past 6 months, Pac helps the ghost of a Mexican drug mule.

episodes.name: Digging Up The Past
episodes.overview: Pac moves into Clyde’s apartment, only to realize it is being haunted by Clyde’s former guidance counselor, whose death may have been Clyde’s fault.

episodes.name: Bong Pong
episodes.overview: Pac and Clyde’s first professional ghost case together involves a dead stoner who can’t remember his unfinished business.

episodes.name: The Cindy 500
episodes.overview: Pac and Clyde help the ghost of a dead porn star who is refusing to let her daughter get married in peace.

episodes.name: Weeknight at Skillitz
episodes.overview: Pac and Clyde help the perverted ghost of a famous DJ in order to get entrance to the exclusive nightclub Le Douche.

episodes.name: Hawk Smith
episodes.overview: In order to meet Instagram celebrity Danny Poker, whom Pac believes has insight into his ghost-seeing abilities, the boys must help the ghost of a wannabe superhero.

episodes.name: Am-Ish
episodes.overview: Pac finally gets face time with Danny Poker, but is interrupted by the ghost of an Amish man looking for his son; Clyde tries to have an orgy.

episodes.name: The Duchess of Stourbridge
episodes.overview: When the completely naked ghost of a 17th century Duchess follows him home, Pac must help fix a painting of her before she will let him eat.

episodes.name: The Shawshanked Redemption
episodes.overview: Persuaded by Danny to take a high profile case, Pac attempts to exorcise a notoriously dangerous prison; Clyde tests out a new form of advertising.

episodes.name: Diaper Training
episodes.overview: Pac and Danny wake up after a “Boys’ Night In” gone horribly wrong, only to find that Clyde (and Danny’s favorite belt) have gone missing.

episodes.name: Medieval Dead
episodes.overview: Pac tries to help the ghost of an old-timey King get revenge on the Knight who betrayed him; Clyde makes some new friends.

episodes.name: Abra-Cadaver
episodes.overview: Pac’s get-rich-quick scheme is derailed by the ghost of a 1980s magician who never got to finish his final trick; Clyde prepares a passive-aggressive dinner.

episodes.name: Death List Three
episodes.overview: Pac finally gets answers from Danny, but they’re not exactly the answers he was hoping for…
